mr_feedback_orchestration.overview:
Complete MR feedback coordination workflow defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/orchestrator-mr-coordination.md
The project online Orchestrator coordinates MR feedback processing from analysis through implementation via MR Actions mode and subsequent Spec/Code modes.
mr_feedback_orchestration.includes: - MR Feedback Detection (trigger phrases, context indicators, priority assessment) - MR Workflow Routing (6-step routing decision tree) - Mode Handoff Protocols (to MR Actions, Spec, and Code modes) - Workflow Integration (with existing SDLC and priority handling) - User Communication (detection messages, coordination updates, approval points) - Error Handling (MR not found, no feedback available, coordination failures)
